high_descs: Turn to the right and then right again to face the black desk.
Pick the phone up from the desk.
Turn around and face the small cabinet with discs on it to the left.
Put the phone on the shelf below the disc.
anns.task_desc: Put a phone on a shelf.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the black desk.
Pick up the white phone next to the box of tissues.
Turn around then turn to your right towards the black nightstand next to the book shelf.
Place the phone on the nightstand underneath the CD's.
anns.task_desc: Take the phone from the desk and place it on the night stand underneath the CD's.

high_descs: Turn around, take a step to the left
take the white cell phone from the desk
Turn around, take a step forward
Put the cell phone on the black end table
anns.task_desc: Take the cell phone from the desk, put it on the end table
